select COUNT(DISTINCT BOOK.BOOK_NAME) as CNT from BOOK
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAY_TOTAL (DAY_TOTAL_DATE, DAY_TOTAL_PRICE) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(BUY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DAY_TOTAL_DATE, SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) FROM BUY WHERE DATE_FORMAT(BUY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(BUY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.select: select DAY_TOTAL_DATE as dayTotalDate, DAY_TOTAL_PRICE as dayTotalPrice from DAY_TOTAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WEEK_TOTAL (WEEK_TOTAL_DATE, WEEK_TOTAL_PRICE) SELECT CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(DAY_TOTAL_DATE, '%Y-%m-'), FLOOR((DAYOFMONTH(DAY_TOTAL_DATE) + DAYOFWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(DAY_TOTAL_DATE, '%Y-%m-01')) - 2) / 7) + 1 ) AS START_DATE, SUM(DAY_TOTAL_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM DAY_TOTAL WHERE DAY_TOTAL_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK(CURDATE())+6 DAY) AND DAY_TOTAL_DATE < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK(CURDATE()) DAY) GROUP BY START_DATE
